title: VILLAGE / BOAT
description: This is the boat you can get from the Net picker. This boat takes you to the Sea Fortress island.VILLAGE ORB / ask boat from netpicker

dialogueTree.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The skiff bobs in the calm waters...."
dialogueTree.english: The skiff bobs in the calm waters. It has nothing more to do.
dialogueTree.polish: Łódź kołysze się na spokojnej tafli. Nie ma już nic do roboty.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Лодка гайдаецца на спакойнай паверхні. Няма ўжо чаго рабіць.

dialogueTree.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The skiff floats on the calm mirror..."
dialogueTree.english: The skiff floats on the calm mirror of the sea -- its two seats are empty.
dialogueTree.polish: Łódka unosi się na spokojnej tafli morza. Jej dwa miejsca siedzące są puste.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Лодка плавае на спакойнай паверхні мора. Яе два месцы для сядзення пустыя.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Once you get in, that's it -- one p..."
links.english: Once you get in, that's it -- one pull of the starter handle and you're off into the bay. A strange trepidation comes over you: are you sure you want to go *now*?
links.polish: Jak już wsiądziesz, nie będzie odwrotu – silnik wypchnie łódź na zatokę. Nachodzi cię jakiś dziwaczny lęk. Na pewno chcesz wyruszyć *teraz*?
links.belarusian: Як толькі сядзеш, не будзе звароту – рухавік выцесніць лодку на затоку. Тады надыходзіць нейкая дзіўная трывога. Ці ўпэўнены ты, што хочаш адправіцца *зараз*?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Have you made all the necessary pre..."
links.english: Have you made all the necessary preparations? Closed all your accounts?
links.polish: Poczyniłeś wszystkie niezbędne przygotowania? Załatwiłeś wszystkie sprawy?
links.belarusian: Вы зрабілі ўсе неабходныя падрыхтоўкі? Вырашылі ўсе справы?

links.title: Logic: "Remember what the Net Picker said:..."
links.english: Remember what the Net Picker said: It's a small tank. You won't be going back and forth on this.
links.polish: Pamiętaj, co mówiła wybieraczka sieci: zbiornik nie jest duży. Nie będziesz mógł tak sobie pływać tam i z powrotem.
links.belarusian: Памятай, што казала выбрацька сеткі: рэзервуар не вялікі. Ты не зможаш проста плаваць туды і назад.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Nothing to do here without the lieu..."
links.english: Nothing to do here without the lieutenant... You must return here with him.
links.polish: Bez porucznika nie ma tu czego szukać... Musisz wrócić razem z nim.
links.belarusian: Без лейтэнанта тут няма чаго шукаць... Ты павінен вярнуцца разам з ім.

links.title: You: ""This banged up old thing... it's a..."
links.english: "This banged up old thing... it's a ROO A72."
links.polish: „Ta stara łajba... to ROO A82”.
links.belarusian: «Гэты стары карабель... гэта ROO A82».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It'll float.""
links.english: "It'll float."
links.polish: „Utrzyma się na wodzie”.
links.belarusian: «Утрымаецца на вадзе».

links.title: Endurance: "He's too banged up himself -- to ta..."
links.english: He's too banged up himself -- to talk torque with you.
links.polish: Sam jest zbyt poobijany, żeby gadać o mechanice.
links.belarusian: Сэм занадта пабіты, каб размаўляць пра механіку.

links.title: You: ""You take the engine, Kim. I'll hol..."
links.english: "You take the engine, Kim. I'll hold the boombox."
links.polish: „Weź silnik, Kim. Ja potrzymam odtwarzacz”.
links.belarusian: «Вазьмі рухавік, Кім. Я падтрымаю прайгравальнік».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
links.english: "What?"
links.polish: „Co?”
links.belarusian: «Што?»

links.title: You: ""What 'what'? How else do we blast..."
links.english: "What 'what'? How else do we blast *Sad FM* on our way to the island?"
links.polish: „Co »co«? Jak inaczej włączymy *Smutne FM* w drodze na wyspę?”
links.belarusian: «Што "што"? Як інакш мы ўключым *Сумнае FM* па дарозе на востраў?»

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine." He gives you resigned shrug..."
links.english: "Fine." He gives you resigned shrug. "Let's *blast* Sad FM then."
links.polish: „Dobrze” – stwierdza, wzruszając ze zrezygnowaniem ramionami. „*Odpalmy* radio Smutne FM”.
links.belarusian: «Добра», — зазначае, уздымаючы плячыма з разгубленасцю. «*Уключым* радыё Сумнае FM».

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Sad FM is a radio station specializ..."
links.english: Sad FM is a radio station specializing in sad, slow rock songs. You seem to know its frequency by heart.
links.polish: Smutne FM to stacja specjalizująca się w smutnych, spokojnych balladach rockowych. Znasz jej częstotliwość na pamięć.
links.belarusian: Смутне FM — гэта станцыя, якая спецыялізуецца на сумных, спакойных рок-баладах. Ты ведаеш яе частату на памяць.

links.title: You: ""You heard me. Don't make me repeat..."
links.english: "You heard me. Don't make me repeat myself."
links.polish: „Dobrze słyszałeś. Nie każ mi się powtarzać”.
links.belarusian: «Ты добра чуў. Не прымушай мяне паўтараць».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine. Why not?" He shrugs."
links.english: "Fine. Why not?" He shrugs.
links.polish: „Dobra. Czemu nie?” – wzrusza ramionami.
links.belarusian: «Добра. Чаму не?» — паціскае плячыма.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Very cool. Now tune it to Sad FM. Y..."
links.english: Very cool. Now tune it to Sad FM. You know you want to.
links.polish: Przeczadowo. To teraz nastaw Smutne FM. Wiesz, że tego chcesz.
links.belarusian: Прыўкрасна. Дык зараз уключай Сумнае FM. Ты ведаеш, што хочаш гэтага.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.english: Say nothing.
links.polish: Nic nie mów.
links.belarusian: Нічога не кажы.

links.title: You: "First -- tie your porta-reel boombo..."
links.english: First -- tie your porta-reel boombox to the breasthook to keep you company.
links.polish: Najpierw przywiąż odtwarzać do pokładnika. Niech ci towarzyszy.
links.belarusian: Спачатку прывяжы прайгравальнік да закладу. Хай ён цябе суправаджае.

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "There. This is now a *Rock and roll..."
links.english: There. This is now a *Rock and roll* skiff.
links.polish: I już. Teraz mamy *rockandrollową* łódź.
links.belarusian: І ўжо. Цяпер у нас ёсць *рок-н-рольная* лодка.

links.title: You: "Cool."
links.english: Cool.
links.polish: Czadowo.
links.belarusian: Крута.

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "It'll keep you company on this lone..."
links.english: It'll keep you company on this lonely voyage.
links.polish: Będzie ci towarzyszył w tej samotnej podróży.
links.belarusian: Ён будзе суправаджаць цябе ў гэтым адзіночным падарожжы.

links.title: You: "What did I just do? Why did I do th..."
links.english: What did I just do? Why did I do that?
links.polish: Co ja właśnie zrobiłem? I dlaczego?
links.belarusian: Што я толькі што зрабіў? І чаму?

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "Why? Because *Rock and Roll*."
links.english: Why? Because *Rock and Roll*.
links.polish: Czemu? Bo *rock and roll*.
links.belarusian: Чаму? Бо *рок-н-рол*.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yeah. *Sad* rock and roll. Tune it..."
links.english: Yeah. *Sad* rock and roll. Tune it to Sad FM.
links.polish: Tak. *Smutny* rock and roll. Nastaw radio na Smutne FM.
links.belarusian: Так. *Сумны* рок-н-рол. Уключы радыё на Сумнае FM.

links.title: You: "Get in and ride to the island."
links.english: Get in and ride to the island.
links.polish: Wsiądź i popłyń na wyspę.
links.belarusian: Сядай і адпраўляйся на востраў.

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The boat comes to a slow stop. You..."
links.english: The boat comes to a slow stop. You turn the engine off -- then there's silence.
links.polish: Łódź powoli się zatrzymuje. Gasisz silnik. Zapada cisza.
links.belarusian: Лодка павольна спыняецца. Ты выключаеш рухавік. Настае цішыня.

Alternate1.english: The boat comes to a slow stop. The lieutenant turns the engine off -- then there's silence.
Alternate1.polish: Łódź powoli się zatrzymuje. Porucznik gasi silnik. Zapada cisza.
Alternate1.belarusian: Лодка павольна спыняецца. Лейтэнант гасіць рухавік. Наступае цішыня.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "In the silence -- a sputter of wing..."
links.english: In the silence -- a sputter of wings. A flock of quails takes off in the distance...
links.polish: Milczenie burzy łopot skrzydeł. W oddali zrywa się do lotu stado mew...
links.belarusian: Цішыню парушае шалясценне крылаў. Удалечыні падымаецца ў палёт статак чаек...

links.title: Shivers: "There is very little wind here toda..."
links.english: There is very little wind here today. The ghost is standing still. You look at your arms, then the cliffs above you...
links.polish: Wiatr jest dzisiaj bardzo słaby. Duch świata się nie porusza. Spoglądasz na swoje ręce, a potem na górujące nad tobą klify...
links.belarusian: Вецер сёння вельмі слабы. Дух свету не рухаецца. Глядзіш на свае рукі, а потым на гары вялікія над табой скалы...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go." He whispers."
links.english: "Let's go." He whispers.
links.polish: „Ruszajmy” – szepcze.
links.belarusian: «Пайшлі» — шэпча.

links.title: You: "[Climb out.]"
links.english: [Climb out.]
links.polish: [Wyjdź].
links.belarusian: [Выйсці].

links.title: Cuno: ""Good. You made it." Cuno stands wi..."
links.english: "Good. You made it." Cuno stands with his arms akimbo, looking at the shadow of the ruined flak tower looming overhead.
links.polish: „Dobrze. Dotarłeś” – Cuno stoi z rękami opartymi o biodra i patrzy na cień zniszczonej wieży przeciwlotniczej wznoszącej się przed wami.
links.belarusian: «Добра. Дабраліся» — Куно стаіць, абапіраючыся рукамі аб клубы, і глядзіць на цень разбуранай зенітнай вежы, якая ўзвышаецца перад вамі.

links.title: You: "[Climb out.]"
links.english: [Climb out.]
links.polish: [Wyjdź].
links.belarusian: [Выйсці].

links.title: Cuno: ""I mapped the place out and uh... i..."
links.english: "I mapped the place out and uh... it looks like both of us aren't gonna make it. This is death island. The hell maw." He wipes snot from his nose.
links.polish: „Zmapowałem to miejsce i... Wygląda na to, że obaj nie ujdziemy stąd cało. To jest wyspa śmierci. Piekielna paszcza” – wyjaśnia i wyciera gila zwisającego z jego nosa.
links.belarusian: «Я намаляваў карту гэтага месца і... Здаецца, што мы абодва адсюль цэлымі не выйдзем. Гэта востраў смерці. Пеклавае пашча», — тлумачыць ён і выцірае соплі, якія звісаюць з яго носа.

links.title: You: ""What the hell are you talking abou..."
links.english: "What the hell are you talking about?
links.polish: „Co ty, do cholery, wygadujesz?”
links.belarusian: «Што ты, чортавы, гаворыш?»

links.title: Cuno: ""I don't know." He throws his hands..."
links.english: "I don't know." He throws his hands in the air.
links.polish: „Nie wiem” – stwierdza, wyrzucając ręce w powietrze.
links.belarusian: „Не ведаю,” – кажа ён, кідаючы рукі ў паветра.

links.title: Cuno: ""Maybe Cuno's just pessimistic beca..."
links.english: "Maybe Cuno's just pessimistic because of the massive speed hangover. I did scout the place out. I can fill you in."
links.polish: „Może Cuno jest nastawiony pesymistycznie z powodu potężnego kaca po speedzie. Zrobiłem zwiad. Mogę przekazać ci szczegóły”.
links.belarusian: «Можа, Куно настроены песімістычна з-за моцнага пахмелля пасля спіда. Я зрабіў разведку. Магу перадаць табе падрабязнасці».

links.title: Cuno: "The kid turns away from you, cautio..."
links.english: The kid turns away from you, cautiously looking to his left and right. He's on the edge.
links.polish: Chłopak odwraca się do ciebie plecami i ostrożnie rozgląda się w lewo i w prawo. Ma napięte nerwy.
links.belarusian: Хлопец паварочваецца да цябе спінай і асцярожна аглядаецца налева і направа. У яго нацягнутыя нервы.

links.title: Logic: "He hasn't been here before either."
links.english: He hasn't been here before either.
links.polish: On też tu nigdy nie był.
links.belarusian: Ён таксама тут ніколі не быў.

links.title: You: ""This isn't death island. Is it?""
links.english: "This isn't death island. Is it?"
links.polish: „Nie no, to chyba nie jest wyspa śmierci?”
links.belarusian: «Не, гэта, напэўна, не востраў смерці?»

links.title: You: ""Hell island? Finally.""
links.english: "Hell island? Finally."
links.polish: „Piekielna wyspa? W końcu”.
links.belarusian: „Пякельная выспа? Нарэшце”.

links.title: Cuno: ""Yes... finally." He says with some..."
links.english: "Yes... finally." He says with some reservations.
links.polish: „Tak... Wreszcie” – stwierdza z pewną rezerwacją.
links.belarusian: «Так... Нарэшце», — зазначае ён з пэўнай асцярожнасцю.

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The time has come."
links.english: The time has come.
links.polish: Nadszedł czas.
links.belarusian: Час надышоў.

links.title: You: "[Climb out.]"
links.english: [Climb out.]
links.polish: [Wyjdź].
links.belarusian: [Выйдзіце].

links.title: You: "(I'm not ready yet.) [Leave.]"
links.english: (I'm not ready yet.) [Leave.]
links.polish: Nie jestem jeszcze gotowy. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: Я яшчэ не гатовы. [Адыдзі].

dialogueTree.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "A skiff with a small steering engin..."
dialogueTree.english: A skiff with a small steering engine in the back floats on the calm mirror of the sea. Its two seats are empty.
dialogueTree.polish: Łódka z małym silnikiem na rufie unosi się na spokojnej tafli morza. Jej dwa miejsca siedzące są puste.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Чоўн з невялікім рухавіком на карме плавае на спакойнай паверхні мора. Яго два месцы для сядзення пустыя.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The boat's belly is a shiny yellow..."
links.english: The boat's belly is a shiny yellow colour, industrial paint over fresh tar. You see it reflect off the water, along with the factory number: A72.
links.polish: Kadłub łodzi lśni żółtą, przemysłową farbą nałożoną na świeżą smołę. Widzisz, jak odbija się w wodzie wraz z numerem fabrycznym: A72.
links.belarusian: Карпус лодкі блішчыць жоўтай, прамысловай фарбай, нанесенай на свежую смалу. Ты бачыш, як ён адбіваецца ў вадзе разам з заводскім нумарам: А72.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "SRV-made, this machine represents h..."
links.english: SRV-made, this machine represents humanitarian aid from a workers' state on the Samaran isola. The *ROO* logo on the engine gives it away -- that and the white five-pointed star.
links.polish: Ta wyprodukowana w LRS maszyna stanowi pomoc humanitarną przysłaną z robotniczego państwa na Isoli Samarskiej. Zdradza to logo *ROO* na silniku. Oraz biała pięcioramienna gwiazda.
links.belarusian: Гэтая машына, вырабленая ў LRS, з'яўляецца гуманітарнай дапамогай, адпраўленай з рабочай дзяржавы на Востраве Самарскі. Пра гэта сведчыць лагатып *ROO* на рухавіку. А таксама белая пяцікутная зорка.
